notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Merlita has an few email RFIs in to BDPQ. She has to chase down answers to finalize. Then I will check everything and we will send to PPM for their final decision.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Merlita is waiting on the samples for the Draperies from CA Blinds. Then final approvals and award. Maybe before end of next week.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Gabriela submitted the Trade Rec and spoke with Kevin Cao + Jingwei Zang about questions related to Alugard proposal / submittals. Award should be imminent.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: CHMC soft requirements came up for Clear Glass at the balconies. This is a change in scope. PPM is deciding on final requirements and may require revised pricng from Alugard.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: PPM awarded to Alugard on Thursday May 15th.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: BDPQ + PPM sent a email on Friday asking to change the glass to Heat Soaked Acid Etched (this is what was used on Pharmacy as I understand). Gabriela is clarifying with Alugard the cost implications and will deal with Cristian if there is an extra. If no extra we will have to adjust the contract and I will follow up with that.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Alugard got back to us that no change in price. So I told Gabriela to make sure the contract properly reflects the change in glass type.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Alugard was awarded the Railings on Wednesday June 25th.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Chasing both Keystone + JJ Home Products for the final pricing.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: We received the pricing from Keystone. Need to properly revise the scope of work this week to move towards award.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: I am working with Ricky to get everything proper and over the finish line for this scope.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Devin and Ricky had meetings with Metro + Keystone to get the scope stratight as per spec. Metro has resubmitted but we are chasing Keystone.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Cristian is meeting with Marco (Matera) at PPMs office for award meeting on Friday May 16th. Award should be wrapped up with that.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: PPM awarded to Matera at Friday May 16th meeting.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: I am addressing the final SOW Schedule of Values with Matera. Will then pass the contract to Cristian for final sign off.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Contract details passed off Jackie complete. All should be good for execution.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Devin sent trade rec out for Classic Tile. Awaiting approval from PPM.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: PPM wanted samples. Devin spoke with Joe and Amir to set up a meeting with Classic + ID + PPM to get approvals on the colour's + styles for the final tiles.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Spoke to Joe about setting up the meeting today again. Not sure it has been set up.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Amir(PM) came to me on Friday with questions which alerted me to problems. Just spoke to Joe Frias and he confirmed speaking with Jingwei on Friday and still no final decision. Joe is working on it with Jingwei later today. Apparently Jingwei mentioned decision will be made in next few weeks.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Cristian is meeting with PPM tomorrow about Sky Windows award and will discuss the flooring with them also.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: PPM is having a meeting with their ID, either Friday or next week. Apparently this will lead to a decision on the flooring.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Currently stands with PPM as we speak. Final approval of Classic's alternates I have still not seen from BDPQ ID. PPM is dealing with Doynsh. I have not heard from PPM recently.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Final Revised price from Classic Time submitted to PPM, along with Trade Rec. Sent revised SOW to Classic Tile to sign just now. Will pass to PPM once signed.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Was awared to Classic Tile on Thursday June 12th.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Ricky has completed all the scope. Devin to final check documents and then ready to send out to PPM.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: I completed the full check yesterday and had some questions. Ricky is finalizing and will then come to me for final check.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Ricky got the info from Amir(PM) on the sealer req'd. Should be able next week to send Trade Rec out.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Ricky sent the latest info to all bidders to update their quotes. When quotes come back, he will revise all the paperwork. I will then check and finalize and we should be good to send the Trade Rec. I am expecting the Trade Rec to be Snow Painting.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Ricky has the Trade Rec package ready to go for Snow Painting when we tell him to send.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Ricky sent the Trade Rec for Snow Painting on Friday June 27th. Waiting on PPM to approve.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Ricky has passed the package to PM (Amir) as he owes the SOW etc. Amir is back on backlog as he has other priorities currently.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Ricky to send to Max Overhead Doors. New Guy for pricing.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Waiting on Amir(PM) for the final SOW + final pricing from Max OH Doors. Then final paperwork and Trade Rec.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Merlita is waiting for the signage package from BDPQ. We will then tender out the package.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: There are some final questions to answer. Ricky + Amir are working to get there and get the prices from CRCE + Orin. Then meetings.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: We have pricing from CRCE and UCC. Waiting on pricing from Orin. Note all the bidders met PM on site and reviewed.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Ricky has meeting with CRCE this week with PPM + Amir(PM) - Friday morning. Some outstanding questions from CRCE to answer this week. Got email from Orin that pricing is coming.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: We received Orin's price this morning. Ricky will work to set up a qualification meeting this week with ORIN. We will move forward from there.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Qualification meeting with Orin is happening as we speak. A few revisions required from CRCE. Then contract should be ready to award. Should be below budget.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Merlita has provided all the Information to site, the PO was Issued and Signed. Now install just need to be arranged.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: We passed the Trade Rec for Citywide Hardware to PPM. They have asked for Additional Prices as they feel the cost should be lower. We have reached out to Almar for additional pricing.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Need to get all the prices and complete the analysis. Most probably PPM will want to VE the MPH.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Waiting on the final revised pricing from all the subs. I am expecting CladCo to be the most competitive, setting up a potential combo award with Lolita.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Gabriela is working to get over the finish line the package with Mill Road. Will also explore savings converting MPH to Metal Corrugated Siding as done on Pharmacy.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Waiting on final pricing for the existing building landscaping.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Gabriela is working on a scope review meeting with Limen for this week. Then we can finalize the paperwork for award.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Scope review meeting is set for Monday. Will then get paperwork in order for award.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Gabriela has the scope review meeting with Joe Frias + Limen today.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: I am chasing Limen for the final paperwork before I can set up the award meeting.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: I sent through the Trade Rec for Limen Masonry on June 19th.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Gabriela sent the invite to Alugard Windows and gave them two weeks to respond.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Will have to have detailed meetings with the second lowest bidder to try qualify their system.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Gabriela is working on the Bid Analysis. Alugard price is still to come.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Gabriela and Devin have an internal meeting with Alugard on Monday Morning at 10am.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Gabriela has the prices. Will have to coordinate this with the windows as the Julliet option may intersect.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: When we receive the coordinated electrical drawings we can close out the tender.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: We have the electrical drawings out to the trades but there are outstanding RFI questions Gabriela has to get answered and out to the trades.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: When we receive the final electrical drawings and coordinated drawings we will send out the tender. We will prepare a tender sheet to try and get back reasonable prices to make the tender easier.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Jingwei is asking for hardware for Mill Road so they can combine with Lolita. I sent out today to Citywide + American Hardware + Trillium Hardware. American Hardware declined so that is why I am trying to get a second price from Trillium Hardware. Gave them two weeks to price.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Trillium Hardware said no. American Hardware said no. We are trying Century, Almar and Wilson Hardware.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Wilson said no also. Almar needs time, probably early July for Mill Road.

subTrades.company: American Hardware Building Supply Co Ltd.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Merlita to have a detailed discussions with some bidders as their costs are too high. We will then have a quick meeting with Basic Caulking probably and then put together a package deal with Lolita.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Merlita is working to get all the paperwork together and questions answered. I will then complete a final check. I am expecting Basic Caulking to be the most competitive. We will set up a scope meeting from there.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Merlita has a meeting scheduled with Basic Caulking on Tuesday at 10am.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: I sent out the package Trade Rec for Mill Road + Lolita for Basic Caulking today.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Merlita sent out the tender. Tender close is May 29th. Will prob then set up a combo award with RJB.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Merlita is working to get all the paperwork together and questions answered. I will then complete a final check. I am expecting RJB Insulation to be the most competitive. We will set up a scope meeting from there.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Merlita has a meeting scheduled with RJB Insulation on June 24th at 10:30am.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: We got the SI today for the roof anchors prelim design. Gabriela to send out the tender tomorrow and give them two weeks.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: We received the prices today as Tender Close was today.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Will send out this tender when we have Balliol Flooring Finalized.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Waiting on the Coordinated Reflected Ceiling Plans to close the tender.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: We require the Arch Suite Ceilings revised. I believe the ID Ceilings plans are coordinated for the common areas.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: I had a call from Jingwei last night asking about Select Drywall. He was also asking about what was holding back drywall here. I told him we need the ceiling plans and he emailed Hector. Hopefully coming soon so we can close this tender.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: We sent out the draft ceiling plans to the bidders to close out the tender. Select Drywall did not call me back.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: We should have prices from Torino, and Cobell by Monday.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Need the coordinated electrical plans to close this tender.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: We are waiting on final pricing. Might be changes to the MPH. Will have to discuss with the low bidder.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: We have prices from CladCo, Ostim and Kaya so far. Analysis to come + meetings.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: CladCo is most competitive here. I would expect the same for Mill Road setting up and potential combo award. Gabriela is working on the analysis.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: I told Gabriela to get this over the finish line for Lolita + Mill Road package.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Hopefully the final award is coming to Sky Windows. Cristian is meeting with Peter + PPM this week to finalize.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Cristian's award meeting with Sky was switched to next week as PPM is busy this week.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Cristian met with Sky Windows + PPM this afternoon. PPM sought out pricing from Alugard Windows with price coming in yesterday.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Sky Windows was awarded Lolita Gardens just now. PPM took the credit to move to Cardinal 272 glass. This was in line with what Alugard was proposing.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Waiting on revised pricing based on the revised drawings.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Just getting all the final paperwork in order. Ready for a package deal with Mill Road.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: I sent through thet Trade Rec package for Limen Masonry on June 19th.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Meetings are complete. Some revised pricing is required from RJB. RJB appears to be the front runner here.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: With revised pricing and complete paperwork, the hope would be a package deal with RJB with Mill Road.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Merlita is working on the anlaysis. We got the final pricing from RJB Insulation. I will review everything and then we should be ready for Trade Rec.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Meetings are complete. Appears PPM wants a package deal for Mill Road also. Basic Caulking appears in the drivers seat here.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: I sent through the Trade Rec for Basic Caulking on June 19th.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: We have asked Marel for price revisions only based on the revised drawings. Idea is for a package deal with Mill Road.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Sohrab said today that PPM is revising suites again and SI is to come Friday this week.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: We received SI-049 for Lolita today. We now have suite revisions and Suite Ceiling revisions, so I think we are good for Marel to finalize.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Marel is working on price revisions. I believe we should have two more to appease PPM. To discuss strategy with John and then get the two final prices.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: I am waiting on the revised prices from Torino + Cobell. Also need Revised price from Marel.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: I have the revised price per latest drawings from Torino. Cobell should be getting me a price this week as well, if not early next week.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Gabriela is working on both Mill Road + Lolita with L&S Security.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: PPM is asking for additional prices for Lolita. We are reaching out to Almar and Wilson Hardware.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Was awarded to CladCo on Friday May 16th, 2025.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Hopefully Matera can get all revised prices in this week and award will follow.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Matera has said they will send their price by Thursday (tomorrow) Morning. Gabriela to revise bid analysis and bring over finish line.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Gabriela sent the revised analysis to Rose Corp on Tuesday. There are a few items to clarify with Matera.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Gabriela has an award meeting scheduled for next Wed at Head Office with Matera + Rose Corp.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Was awarded to Matera yesterday, June 18th, 2025. Gabriela to finish up the contract documents for Jackie.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: I am waiting on revised pricing from Citywide. Then can update the analysis and sent to Rose Corp. Citywide missed a soft deadline Friday, so I hope no problems with Rose Corp.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Citywide has sent me their price, but I had questions and back and forth with them. Hopefully tomorrow morning they will be back to me.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: I settled with Citywide and sent the pacakge to Rose Corp. Await their comments on the next step.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Rose Corp came back with some comments + Addendum and wants me to circulate back to Citywide for revisions. Will reveiw and advise Citywide.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: I sent all the revised Docs to Citywide. Rose Corp had a discusssion with them about some changes. Rose Corp is now pushing for the final price. I am chasing Citywide.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Citywide was supposed to send their revised pricing yesterday, but I am still waiting.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Citywide was awarded the contract yesterday.

subTrades.company: American Hardware Building Supply Co Ltd.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: We have received the prices but the final SOW is on hold from Rose Corp.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Ricky is working on getting the analysis together as I assume Rose Corp will want to award this soon.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Rose Corp is going back and forth between Astley Gilbert + Sign Network. Merlita is waiting on their final decision.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Rose Corp is pushing Astley Gilbert for the final price based on their final details back and forth recently.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Final details being worked out with Astley Gilbert. The contract should be awarded soon.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Ricky held meetings with GTeck and Bond Securcom. Appears Bond is the faviorite and Ricky is waiting on revised pricing from them.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Rose Corp is working with Bond Securcom to complete the security. They are also buying the Salto Lock System from them.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: Appears to be going to Lenworth as Atlas Doors did not answer phone calls in a timely manner.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: PPM awarded to Midnorthern Appliances on Jan 21, 2025.

notes.author: Devin
notes.text: I am hoping to tender this later in the summer or fall, if Rose Corp does not demand earlier.
